title: Downloading game
body: Hi everyone, some days ago i was downloading the gamre trhough the client and i've downloaded about 8gb out of 16gb total. Todiay i've restarted the client and i've noticed that the download started again from the beginning. Is it normal? Must I download all the 16gb in one session?

replies.body: Yea, unfortunately, our client doesn't have any kind of pause feature. You'll need to let the full game download and patch in one sitting. It's best to try and use an ethernet connection for the download to make sure it's not interrupted and you get the best speeds!
